mapper.insert: SELECT TOA_SYS_ROLE_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL INSERT INTO toa_sys_role(ID,NAME,DESCRIPTION,DEPT_ID,DELETE_FLAG,CREATE_USER_ORG,CREATE_USER_DEPT,CREATE_USER,CREATE_DATE,MODIFY_USER,MODIFY_DATE,QUEUE) VALUES (#{id},#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{deptId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{deleteFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUserOrg,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUserDept,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{modifyUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{queue,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.update:
UPDATE toa_sys_role
NAME = #{name},
DESCRIPTION = #{description},
DEPT_ID = #{deptId},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER_ORG = #{createUserOrg},
CREATE_USER_DEPT = #{createUserDept},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate},
REMARK1 = #{remark1},
REMARK2 = #{remark2},
QUEUE = #{queue},
where ID = #{id}
